properties.address: The Salvation Army, Alnwick, Northumberland NE66 1QE
properties.description: Monthly lunch, offering a warm and welcoming space with a two course lunch and often with a speaker. This does need to be booked due to restricted space.
properties.title: Alnwick Lunch group

properties.address: Christon Bank Methodsit Church, Christon Bank, Northumberland NE66 3DQ
properties.description: A monthly lunch held on the second Wednesday in the month at 12.30pm, in the community hall attached to the Methodist Church in Christon Bank. A donation towards the meal, for those who can afford, it is gratefully received.
properties.title: Village Lunch
